languages.text: {n}Вы почти слышите хруст крошащихся зубов, сквозь которые прорывается высокое и исполненное ненависти:{/n} "Безус-с-словно".
{n}You can almost hear the crunching of teeth as Macharius answers in a high and hate-filled hiss:{/n} "Certainly not."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы почти слышите хруст крошащихся зубов, сквозь которые прорывается высокое и исполненное ненависти:{/n} "Безус-с-словно".

traits.locale_text: {n}You can almost hear the crunch of crumbling teeth as high and hateful rips through them:{/n} "D-definitely."
{n}You can almost hear the crunch of crumbling teeth as high and hateful rips through them:{/n} "D-definitely."
{n}You can almost hear the crunch of crumbling teeth as high and hateful rips through them:{/n} "D-definitely."
{n}You can almost hear the crunching of teeth as Macharius answers in a high and hate-filled hiss:{/n} "Certainly not."
{n}You can almost hear the crunching of teeth as Macharius answers in a high and hate-filled hiss:{/n} "Certainly not."

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez presque le grincement de ses dents lorsqu'il siffle avec haine de sa voix haut perchée :{/n} « Absolument pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}You can almost hear the crunching of teeth as Macharius answers in a high and hate-filled hiss:{/n} "Certainly not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez presque le grincement de ses dents gâtées lorsqu'il siffle avec haine, la mâchoire serrée :{/n} « Mais pas... du t... tout. »

languages.text: {n}你几乎听到了马卡里乌斯满怀恨意的嘶嘶声，他咬牙切齿地回答着你。{/n}“当……当然不会。”
languages.original_text: {n}You can almost hear the crunching of teeth as Macharius answers in a high and hate-filled hiss:{/n} "Certainly not."

traits.locale_text: {n}你几乎听到了满怀恨意的咬牙切齿。{/n}“当……当然不会。”

languages.text: {n}Du kannst beinahe das Knirschen von Zähnen hören, als Macharius mit einem hasserfüllten Zischen antwortet:{/n} "Sicher nicht!"
languages.original_text: {n}You can almost hear the crunching of teeth as Macharius answers in a high and hate-filled hiss:{/n} "Certainly not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst fast das Knacken bröckelnder Zähne, als hasserfüllt durch sie hindurchgepresst wird:{/n} "D-Definitiv."

languages.text: {n}Casi puedes oír el rechinar de sus dientes cuando Macharius responde en un siseo agudo y lleno de odio:{/n} «Por supuesto que no».
languages.original_text: {n}You can almost hear the crunching of teeth as Macharius answers in a high and hate-filled hiss:{/n} "Certainly not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Casi puedes oír el rechinar de sus dientes mientras pronuncia con rabia:{/n} «P-por supuesto que no».

languages.text: {n}今にも歯をギシギシと鳴らしそうな様子で、マハリウスは憎悪が滲む上擦った抑えめの声で答える。{/n}「もちろん無理です」
languages.original_text: {n}You can almost hear the crunching of teeth as Macharius answers in a high and hate-filled hiss:{/n} "Certainly not."

traits.locale_text: {n}今にも歯をギシギシと鳴らしそうな様子で、マハリウスは憎悪が滲む上擦った抑えめの声で答える。{/n}「もちろん無理です」

languages.text: {n}Macharius, yüksek sesli ve nefret dolu bir tıslamayla cevap verirken dişlerinin gıcırdamasını duyacak gibi oluyorsun.{/n} "Elbette."
languages.original_text: {n}You can almost hear the crunching of teeth as Macharius answers in a high and hate-filled hiss:{/n} "Certainly not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius, yüksek sesli ve nefret dolu bir tıslamayla cevap verirken dişlerinin gıcırdamasını duyacak gibi oluyorsun.{/n}
